GDAD-POC-KEY.name: gdad_poc_mesh
GDAD-POC-KEY.description: Contains Policies and all the other sharding compartments

GDAD-POC-NETWORKS-KEY.name: gdad_poc_networks_mesh_cotud
GDAD-POC-NETWORKS-KEY.description: Contains VNC, Subnets, Routing Rules, Sec Lists, DRGs, Service Gateways, External Bastion

GDAD-POC-DATABASES-KEY.name: gdad_poc_databases_mesh_cotud
GDAD-POC-DATABASES-KEY.description: Autonomous Databases and Autonomous Container Databases

GDAD-POC-CERT-VAULT-KEYS-KEY.name: gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud
GDAD-POC-CERT-VAULT-KEYS-KEY.description: Certificate Authorities, Certificate Bundles, Certificates, Vaults, and Keys

CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-ADMINS-KEY.name: CertificateAuthorityAdmins-mesh-cotud
CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-ADMINS-KEY.description: Purpose of this group is to manage certificate-authority-family

CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-POLICY-KEY.name: CertificateAuthority-Policy-mesh-cotud
CERTIFICATE-AUTHORITY-POLICY-KEY.description: Allow certificate authorities to use keys in this compartment gdad_poc_mesh
statements: allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_certificate_authority_group_mesh_cotud to use keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh
allow dynamic-group gdad-poc-certificate-authority-group to manage objects in compartment gdad_poc_mesh

GDAD-POC-VIEW-VAULT-KEY.name: gdad-poc-view-vault-mesh-cotud
statements: allow service keymanagementservice to manage vaults in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud

GDAD-POC-EXADATA-COMPARTMENT-ACCESS-VAUL.name: gdad-poc-exadata-compartment-access-vault-and-keys-mesh-cotud
GDAD-POC-EXADATA-COMPARTMENT-ACCESS-VAUL.description: poc exadata vaults and keys policies
statements: allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_cluster_compartment_resources_mesh_cotud to manage keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud
allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_cluster_compartment_resources_mesh_cotud to read vaults in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud

GDAD-POC-ACCESS-VAULT-AND-KEYS-KEY.name: gdad-poc-access-vault-and-keys-mesh-cotud
GDAD-POC-ACCESS-VAULT-AND-KEYS-KEY.description: PoC General vaults and keys policies
statements: Allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_certificate_authority_group_mesh_cotud to use keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud
Allow dynamic-group gdad_poc_certificate_authority_group_mesh_cotud to manage objects in compartment gdad_poc_mesh

GDAD-POC-CERTIFICATE-ADMIN-KEY.name: gdad-poc-certificate-admin-mesh-cotud
GDAD-POC-CERTIFICATE-ADMIN-KEY.description: Allow certificate admin to manage certificate-authority-family
statements: Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins-mesh-cotud to manage certificate-authority-family in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins-mesh-cotud to read keys in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins-mesh-cotud to use key-delegate in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins-mesh-cotud to read buckets in compartment gdad_poc_mesh
Allow group CertificateAuthorityAdmins-mesh-cotud to read vaults in compartment gdad_poc_mesh:gdad_poc_certs_vaults_keys_mesh_cotud
